forest_stew.name: Forest Stew
forest_stew.description: A simple but hearty stew made from mushrooms and berries, cooked over the campfire.

trail_mash.name: Trail Mash
trail_mash.description: A filling mash of trail nuts, roasted and mashed together into a simple meal.

wayfinding_tea.name: Wayfinding Tea
wayfinding_tea.description: You carefully brew the dream fern and mooncap mushroom together, their essences merging into a warm, fragrant tea. As you stir, the paths you've walked seem to overlap in your mindâ€”the Forest remembers, and so do you.

cooked_stoneback_trout.name: Cooked Stoneback Trout
cooked_stoneback_trout.description: You cook the raw trout over the campfire until the flesh is flaky and warm. The smell is inviting, and it's ready for a proper meal.

cooked_creek_darter.name: Cooked Creek Darter
cooked_creek_darter.description: You cook the small fish over the campfire until the flesh is delicate and flaky. A simple but satisfying meal.

cooked_silt_crab.name: Cooked Silt Crab
cooked_silt_crab.description: You cook the crab over the campfire until the meat is tender and the shell is warm. The smell is inviting, and it's ready for a proper meal.
